value.title: New polyp image classification technique using transfer learning of network-in-network structure in endoscopic images
value.excerpt: This research improved the performance of polyp classification through the fine-tuning of Network-in-Network (NIN) after applying a pre-trained model of the ImageNet database. Random shuffling is performed 20 times on 1000 colonoscopy images.

value.title: Intenseye raises $4M to boost workplace safety through computer vision
value.excerpt: Workplace injuries and illnesses cost the U.S. upwards of $250 billion each year, according to the Economic Policy Institute. ERA-backed startup Intenseye, a machine learning platform, has raised a $4 million seed round to try to bring that number way down in an economic and efficient way.
